info.title: CRM Associations Schema
info.x-hubspot-api-use-case: To associate a contact with a company, use this API to get the necessary associationTypeId and associationCategory.
info.x-hubspot-introduction: Use the association schema API to understand how different types of CRM records and activities can relate to one another, as well as define your own custom associations.

get.description: Returns all user configurations available on a given portal
Returns user configurations on all association definitions between two object types

post.description: Batch create user configurations between two object types

get.description: Returns all association types between two object types

put.description: Update a user defined association definition

post.description: Create a user defined association definition
Batch delete user configurations between two object types
Batch update user configurations between two object types

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

correlationId.description: A unique identifier for the request. Include this value with any error reports or support tickets

links.description: A map of link names to associated URIs containing documentation about the error or recommended remediation steps

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate
message.example: Invalid input (details will vary based on the error)

example.message: Invalid input (details will vary based on the error)

code.description: The status code associated with the error detail

in.description: The name of the field or parameter in which the error was found.
